review: He is really skilled,experienced,Experienced, ************* doctor. He performed my third molar extraction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had approached Dr. Sanket Gavhane 3years ago for the extraction of my wisdom teeth. He had extracted two teeth back then one of which had to be removed surgically. The procedure went smoothly and I did not experience any pain or trauma. I really liked his treatment plan. Thus, when my other wisdom teeth began to give me problems, I approached Dr. Sanket Gavhane again. Once again, I had an extremely pleasant experience. No pain whatsoever and he was done so quickly, that just shows his expertise in the field. I recommend him to all my friends and family.
reply_text: Thank You Miss Anushree for your kinds words .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am 76 years old and have recently got the treatment of full mouth rehabilitation done from Dr. Sanket. He's a very kind and friendly natured doctor. Had explained my dental issue very well and treated with excellence. I'm able to eat well and live healthy. I would surely recommend Dr. Sanket for any dental issue.

Painless and effortless wisdom tooth extraction even with a complex root structure, uses a very different technique for tooth extraction and is very effective too. The doctor is calm, works well with Dr Sanket Sheth, and is very skilled. Thanks Dr Sanket Gavhane.
reply_text: Thank you for ur kind words
